definitions.definition: A cell of the immune system , such as a neutrophil , macrophage or dendritic cell , that engulfs and destroys viruses , bacteria and waste materials, or in the case of mature dendritic cells; displays antigens from invading pathogens to cells of the lymphoid lineage .

main_definition: ( cytology ) A cell of the immune system , such as a neutrophil , macrophage or dendritic cell , that engulfs and destroys viruses , bacteria and waste materials, or in the case of mature dendritic cells; displays antigens from invading pathogens to cells of the lymphoid lineage .
